contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The case is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for reconsideration based on Department of Transportation v. Renwick, 543 Pa. 122, 669 A.2d 934 (1996). Jurisdiction relinquished.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
